item.title: 317 censor
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Censoring is done client-sided, I was refactoring this earlier. Just return out of your doCensor function early.

[code=java]private static final boolean CENSOR = false;

String doCensor(String s) {
if (!CENSOR) {
return s;
}
// …
}[/code]

Read full topic
